title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Adriatic Coast – Chieti Province, Italy
content:
Photo submitted by David Redding, “From a ride along the Adriatic Coast of Italy, through the Riserva Naturale di Punta Aderci, last week!” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. author: Kristi Benedict
